"'''Kill the Boy'''"<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/titles-for-game-of-thrones-season-five-episodes-5-7-have-been-revealed-plus-a-character-renamed/]</ref> is the fifth episode of the [[Season 5|fifth season]] of ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. It is the forty-fifth episode of the series overall.  It will premiere on May 10, 2015. It was directed by [[Jeremy Podeswa]].
sections.Notes: *The title of this episode is apparently a reference to a prominent quote from the novels.  Maester [[Aemon]] advises [[Jon Snow]] about growing into a man of the [[Night's Watch]], how he must mature into it and make selfless decisions. He therefore repeats to him the same advice he gave his own brother [[Aegon V Targaryen|Aegon]] when he was crowned king:  "Kill the boy, and let the man be born."
